parameters.name: withProperties
parameters.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new Gradient (Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the Gradient.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the Gradient with the specified index or name.

parameters.name: index
parameters.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the Gradient with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the Gradient with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the Gradients within the specified range.

parameters.name: from
parameters.shortdesc: The Gradient, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: Gradient, Long Integer or String.

parameters.name: to
parameters.shortdesc: The Gradient, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: Gradient, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first Gradient in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last Gradient in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle Gradient in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Gradient with the index previous to the specified index.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The index of the Gradient that follows the desired Gradient.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the Gradient whose index follows the specified Gradient in the collection.

parameters.name: obj
parameters.shortdesc: The Gradient whose index comes before the desired Gradient.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any Gradient in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every Gradient in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the Gradient.
Returns the Gradient with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
